name: Expiration Date
description:
-

Dating puzzle game made in about 7 hours for MálagaJam Weekend VI.

You must find the cards that match the conversation icons while avoiding the bombs. Mistakes will reduce your lives (red flower). Try to survive to this date for as long as possible.

Make sure you remember the cards, at the beginning of each round only the new cards are shown.

Expanded instructions: If you get one of the two conversation icons right you'll lose one life. If you get both wrong you'll lose two. If you click on a bomb your date ends.

art & design: Isabel Tallos

code & design: Ludipe
